[acss-font-weight="normal"]

Weight normal is same as 400.

ELEMENT

[acss-font-weight="bold"]

Weight bold is same as 700.

ELEMENT

[acss-font-weight="lighter"]

Weight lighter is lighter than parent element.

WEIGHT 700 LIGHTER

[acss-font-weight="bolder"]

Weight bolder is bolder than parent element.

WEIGHT 500 BOLDER

[acss-font-weight="100"]

Some font-family doesn't support all font weight, so weight 100 could be same as 200
